description: Retrieves information about an assistant association.

parameters.name: assistantAssociationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the assistant association. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Wisdom assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: assistantArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Wisdom assistant.

nested_items.name: assistantAssociationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assistant association.

nested_items.name: assistantAssociationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the assistant association.

nested_items.name: assistantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Wisdom assistant.

nested_items.name: associationData
nested_items.description: A union type that currently has a single argument, the knowledge base ID.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseAssociation
nested_items.description: The knowledge base where output data is sent.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the knowledge base.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it.
